summary: This document is a July 2021 memo prepared by an Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA) and a detective for trial testimony. It lists previously undisclosed or clarified recollections from a witness, primarily concerning interactions with Jeffrey Epstein (JE) and Ghislaine Maxwell (GM), including details about payments, transportation, and specific incidents of abuse.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as JE; the witness recalls receiving payments from him, receiving packages from him, being driven to his house, and being instructed by him to massage another individual.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as GM; the witness recalls her having longer hair in the past, her asking the witness to get a cellphone, and an incident where GM saw the witness nude.

connections.description: Both are central figures in the witness's recollections of coordinated activities, including arranging transportation and communications with the witness.
The witness describes receiving money from Epstein, being driven to his house, receiving packages from him, and being instructed by him for sexual activity.
The witness recalls Maxwell asking her to get a cellphone for easier contact and an incident where Maxwell saw her nude in a massage room.

events.title: Witness receives first payment from Epstein
events.description: The witness recalls receiving approximately $300 the first time she went to Jeffrey Epstein's residence.

events.title: Maxwell sees witness nude
events.description: The witness estimates she was about 16 years old when Ghislaine Maxwell saw her nude in a massage room.

events.title: Witness instructed to massage 'fat bald man'
events.description: The witness believes Jeffrey Epstein told her to massage a 'fat bald man' with whom she had sex for money at an unspecified location.

events.title: Witness interview with law enforcement
events.description: The witness had an interview with law enforcement in 2007 but does not remember the specific questions asked.

keyFacts: The witness recalls receiving about $300 during her first visit to Jeffrey Epstein's house.
The witness estimates she was approximately 16 years old when Ghislaine Maxwell saw her nude in a massage room.
The witness believes Jeffrey Epstein instructed her to massage a 'fat bald man' with whom she had sex for money.
The witness received a 'Massage for Dummies' book in a FedEx package from Jeffrey Epstein.
The witness participated in the victim compensation fund, which she understands prevents her from suing Ghislaine Maxwell.
